rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: An object that help identify and usually accompanied certain type of iconographic representation, and help define the character or a type of character portrayed. They usually are taken from on episode of the life of the character depicted
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Iconographical Attribute

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A human, or anthropomorphic figure, that represents an abstract idea or a concept
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Personification

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: The activity of assigning the iconographical status to a man-made object, or to one of its parts. It takes into account the possibility to link it to a speech act or a document where the authoritative proposition is clearly made
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Visual Recognition

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class comprises fictional individuals, or groups, appearing in a 2D/3D representation. Each character portrayed can have a type. Every saints portrayed is considered here as a character and not as an actor
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Character

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: The class document the phenomenon of anchorage defined by Barthes as linguistic elements, which can serve to 'anchor' (or constrain) to a specific readings of an image. Example can be inscription, which constrain a specific readings of an iconographical object, or the caption used for a photos.
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Anchorage

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: The front or face of a single sheet or the right-hand page of an open book. The feature is presents in object such as codex, books, pamphlets, documents, photographs and painting.
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Recto

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: An Iconographical Atom is a physical arrangement of forms and colours created by human activity
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Iconographical Atom

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: The back or underside of a single sheet of paper, or the left-hand page of an open book. The feature is presents in object such as codex, books, pamphlets, documents, photographs and painting.
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Verso

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: The class comprise concept coming from vocabularies and thesauri used to characterise the combination of a particular pigment (or set of pigments) with the reflected or transmitted light
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Color

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A layer is a stratum composed by one or more materials that cover a surface, or part of it, of a physical body. A Layer usually can rest on a physical object (wall), but can rest also on a previous layer
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Layer

rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: A visual item that represent the nuclear characteristic of a particular set of symbols associate with a cognitive type of a person, animal or concept
rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Iconographical Object

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property describes the source used for the status assignment
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: On the base of

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property describes the source used for the status assignment
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is based on

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property indicates the status assigned during the visual recognition event
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: assigned

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property indicates the status assigned during the visual recognition event
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: was assigned by

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property associates an attribute with the iconographical object where it is depicted
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: has attribute

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property associates an attribute with the iconographical object where it is depicted
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is attribute of

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property document the assignment of an iconographical object to a specific physical man-made object
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Denote

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property document the assignment of an iconographical object to a specific physical man-made object
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is denoted by

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property put in relation an iconographical object with a part of itself.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: forms part of

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property put in relation an iconographical object with a part of itself.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is composed of

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property indicates the entity referred by the rvisual epresentation
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: depict

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property indicates the entity referred by the rvisual epresentation
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is depiction of attribute

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property indicates the membership of a personification in an iconographical object
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: has personification

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property indicates the membership of a personification in an iconographical object
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is present in

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property indicates the connotation relationships, formalised by Barthes, between a conceptual entity and an iconographical object
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: connote

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property indicates the connotation relationships, formalised by Barthes, between a conceptual entity and an iconographical object.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is connoted by

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property put in relation an iconographical object with the portrayed character.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: portray

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property put in relation an iconographical object with the portrayed character.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is portrayed by

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property put in relation a conceptual object with its personification in a work of art
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: symbolize

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property put in relation a conceptual object with its personification in a work of art
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is personification of

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property associates an instance of IC16 Character with an instance of E39 Actor that the character is motivated by or is intended to represent
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: has source

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property associates an instance of IC16 Character with an instance of E39 Actor that the character is motivated by or is intended to represent
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is source of

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property associates an instance of S8 Layer with the Physical Thing it rest on
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: rest on

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property associates an instance of S8 Layer with the Physical Thing it rest on
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: has layer

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property associate an information object to a iconographical representation
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: illustrate

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property associate an information object to a iconographical representation
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is illustrated by

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property documents the symbolic object which has been used in the anchoring activity.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: anchors

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property documents the symbolic object which has been used in the anchoring activity
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: was anchored by

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property documents the image used within the anchoring activity
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: anchors to

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property documents the image used within the anchoring activity
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is anchored by

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property documents the type of color observed during a visual recognition activity
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: observed colour

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property documents the type of color observed during a visual recognition activity
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: has been observed in

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property documents the use of a specific prototypical example for an image. The nature of the relationships helps define a map of relationships between prototypical items used in the arts.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is visual prototype of

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property documents the use of a specific prototypical example for an image. The nature of the relationships helps define a map of relationships between prototypical items used in the arts.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: has visual prototype

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property documents the presence of a Verso or a Recto, respectively in the back or in the front of an object
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: has back

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property documents the presence of a Verso or a Recto, respectively in the back or in the front of an object.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: has front

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property indicates the presence of a recto in the described object
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is recto of

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property indicates the presence of a recto in the described object
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: has recto

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property indicates the presence of a verso in the described object
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: is verso of

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property indicates the presence of a verso in the described object
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: has verso

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property documents the assignment of status to a specific physical thing
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: Assigned status to

rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: The property documents the assignment of status to a specific physical thing.
rdf:Property.rdfs:label: has status assigned by
